summary.span: 用作定义所有列表类型控件通用的属性、方法和事件的抽象基类。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class that defines the properties, methods, and events common for all list-type controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能直接创建 抽象类的实例。An instance of the abstract class cannot be created directly. 相反，此类由其他类（如 、、和 类）继承，以提供常见的基本功能。Instead, this class is inherited by other classes, such as the , , , and classes, to provide common basic functionality. 利用 类的属性，可以指定数据源以填充列表控件。The properties of the class allow you to specify the source of the data to populate the list control. 使用 属性指定要绑定到列表控件的数据源。Use the property to specify the data source to bind to the list control. 如果数据源包含多个表，则使用 属性指定要使用的表。If the data source contains more than one table, use the property to specify the table to use. 您可以通过分别设置 和 属性，将数据源中的不同字段绑定到列表控件中的项的 和 属性。You can bind different fields in the data source to the and properties of the items in the list control by setting the and properties, respectively. 为列表控件中的每个项显示的文本可以通过设置 "" 属性进行格式设置。The text displayed for each item in the list control can by formatted by setting the property. 列表控件中显示的所有项均存储在 集合中。All items displayed in the list control are stored in the collection. 您可以通过使用 属性，以编程方式指定或确定列表控件中选定项的索引。You can programmatically specify or determine the index of a selected item in the list control by using the property. 可以使用 属性访问选定项的属性。The properties of the selected item can be accessed by using the property. 类提供 事件，该事件在列表中的选定内容在向服务器的各次发送之间发生更改时引发。The class provides the event, which is raised when the selection in the list control changes between posts to the server. 这允许您为此事件提供自定义处理程序。This allows you to provide a custom handler for this event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 类实现 接口，以便可以在其他控件的模板模式下使用派生的列表类型控件。The class implements the interface so that derived list-type controls can be used in the template mode of other controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 控件中选择项。The following code example demonstrates how to select items in a control. 如果在文本框中找到该项，则选择该项并显示一条消息，其中显示了所选项的名称。If the item is found in the text box, the item is selected and a message is displayed stating the name of the selected item. 如果找不到该项，则不选择任何项，并显示一条消息，指出找不到该项。If the item is not found, no item is selected and a message is displayed stating that the item was not found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/CS/listcontrolselectedvaluecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/VB/listcontrolselectedvaluevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Applies HTML attributes and styles to render to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员用来向派生自 类的控件的 输出流中插入附加特性和样式。The method is used primarily by control developers to insert the additional attributes and styles into the output stream for controls that are derived from the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否在绑定数据之前清除列表项的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether list items are cleared before data binding.

value.span: 如果不在绑定数据之前清除列表项，则为 ；如果在执行数据绑定之前清除项集合，则为 。

span.span: if list items are not cleared before data binding; otherwise, , if the items collection is cleared before data binding is performed.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许在进行数据绑定之前将项添加到 对象。The property allows you to add items to the object before data binding occurs. 数据绑定后，items 集合包含来自数据源的项和以前添加的项。After data binding, the items collection contains both the items from the data source and the previously added items. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 控件中包含未进行数据绑定的数据绑定项和项。The following code example demonstrates how to include both data-bound items and items that are not data-bound in a control. 在 的 事件中，将一个项添加到 集合，并将 属性设置为 `true`。In the event for the , one item is added to the collection and the property is set to `true`. 然后， 控件绑定到 控件。Then, the control is bound to a control. 生成的 控件包含数据绑定项和单独添加的项。The resulting control contains both the data-bound items and the item that was added individually. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlAppendDataBoundItems#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAppendDataBoundItems/CS/AppendItemsCs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlAppendDataBoundItems#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAppendDataBoundItems/VB/AppendItemsVb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当用户更改列表中的选定内容时是否自动产生向服务器的回发。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a postback to the server automatically occurs when the user changes the list selection.

value.span: 如果只要用户更改列表中的选定内容就自动产生向服务器的回发，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a postback to the server automatically occurs whenever the user changes the selection of the list; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果服务器需要在进行选择时立即捕获选定内容，请将此属性设置为 `true`。Set this property to `true` if the server needs to capture the selection as soon as it is made. 例如，可以根据用户在列表控件中所做的选择，自动填充网页上的其他控件。For example, other controls on the Web page can be automatically filled depending on the user's selection from a list control. 此属性可用于根据用户在列表中所做的选择，自动填充网页上的其他控件。This property can be used to allow automatic population of other controls on the Web page based on a user's selection from a list. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 控件启用 。The following example demonstrates how to enable for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlAutoPostBack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAutoPostBack/CS/ListControlAutoPostBackcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlAutoPostBack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAutoPostBack/VB/ListControlAutoPostBackvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示在单击从 类派生的控件时是否执行验证的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when a control that is derived from the class is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定单击 控件时是否执行验证。Use the property to determine whether validation is performed when a control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 默认情况下，单击从 类派生的控件不会导致页验证。By default, clicking a control that is derived from the class does not cause page validation. 若要在单击从 类派生的控件时执行页验证，请将 属性设置为 "`true`"。To perform page validation when the control that is derived from the class is clicked, set the property to `true`. 当 属性的值设置为 `true`时，还可以使用 属性来指定 控件对其进行验证的验证组的名称。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置格式化字符串，该字符串用来控制如何显示绑定到列表控件的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatting string used to control how data bound to the list control is displayed.

value.span: 绑定到控件的数据的格式化字符串。

span.span: The formatting string for data bound to the control.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可为列表控件中的项提供自定义的显示格式。Use the property to provide a custom display format the items in a list control. 数据格式字符串由以冒号分隔的两部分组成，格式为 {`A`： `Bxx`}。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 例如，格式化字符串 {0:F2} 会将单元格格式设置为显示具有两个小数位的固定的点号。For example, the formatting string {0:F2} would format the cell to display a fixed point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整个字符串必须括在大括号中，以指示它是格式字符串而不是文本字符串。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本都显示为文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒号前面的值（在常规示例中为`A`）指定从零开始的参数列表中的参数索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此值只能设置为0，因为每个单元格中只有一个值。This value can only be set to 0 because there is only one value in each cell. 冒号后面的字符（在常规示例中为`B`）指定要在其中显示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format to display the value in. 下表列出了常见格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|显示采用科学（指数）格式的数字值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|以数字格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，`X`除外，后者在指定的情况下显示十六进制字符。The format character is not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符后的值（在常规示例中为`xx`）指定要显示的有效位数或小数位数。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 下表包含设置字符串格式和结果的示例。The following table contains examples of formatting strings and the results. 它采用标准的英语设置。It assumes standard English settings. |数值Numeric Value|格式字符串Format String|结果Result| |-------------------|-------------------|------------| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:C}""{0:C}"|$12,345.68$12,345.68| |-12345.6789-12345.6789|"{0:C}""{0:C}"|($12,345.68)($12,345.68)| |1234512345|"{0:D}""{0:D}"|1234512345| |1234512345|"{0:D8}""{0:D8}"|0001234500012345| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:E}""{0:E}"|1234568E+0041234568E+004| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:E10}""{0:E10}"|1.2345678900E+0041.2345678900E+004| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:F}""{0:F}"|12345.6812345.68| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:F0}""{0:F0}"|1234612346| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:G}""{0:G}"|12345.678912345.6789| |123456789123456789|"{0:G7}""{0:G7}"|1.234568E81.234568E8| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:N}""{0:N}"|12,345.6812,345.68| |123456789123456789|"{0:N4}""{0:N4}"|123,456,789.0000123,456,789.0000| |12345.678912345.6789|"Total： {0:C}""Total: {0:C}"|总计： $12345.68Total: $12345.68| 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通知服务器控件在保存视图状态和呈现内容之前执行任何必需的预呈现步骤。This method notifies the server control to perform any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content. 它通常由控件开发人员在扩展 类时使用。It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当列表控件中的选定内容在向服务器的各次发送之间发生更改时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the selection from the list control changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 为了使此事件正常运行，列表控件必须在发送到服务器之间保存一些值。A list control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 确保为列表控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for the list control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件指定和编写处理程序，以显示用户所做的选择。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the selection made by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/CS/ListControlDataSourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/VB/ListControlDataSourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置列表中选定项的最低序号索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the lowest ordinal index of the selected items in the list.

value.span: 列表中选定项的最低序号索引。

span.span: The lowest ordinal index of the selected items in the list.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示未选定任何内容。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that nothing is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果列表控件只允许选择一项，请使用此属性来确定列表中当前选定项的索引。Use this property to determine the index of the currently selected item in the list if the list control allows only one selection. 如果列表控件支持多个选择，请使用此属性来确定所选项目的最小索引。If the list control supports multiple selections, use this property to determine the lowest index of the selected items. 在回发时，不会特别保存 属性的值。The value of the property is not specifically saved on postback. 它使用 属性在回发时还原。It is restored on postback using the property. 例如，如果 属性为4，则在回发时， 属性设置为 属性为4的 对象的索引。For example, if the property is 4, on postback, the property is set to the index of the object that has a property of 4. 如果多个 对象的 属性为4，则选择 集合中的第一项。If more than one object has a property of 4, the first item in the collection is selected. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 确定 中选定项的最低索引。The following example demonstrates how to use to determine the lowest index of the selected items in the . [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlSelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedIndex/CS/ListControlSelectedIndexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlSelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedIndex/VB/ListControlSelectedIndexvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 在呈现列表时，该索引已被设置为小于 -1 或大于、等于列表中项数的值。

span.span: The index was set to less than -1, or greater than or equal to the number of items on the list at the time the list is rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当列表控件中的选定内容在向服务器的各次发送之间发生更改时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the selection from the list control changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 为了使此事件正常运行，列表控件必须在发送到服务器之间保存一些值。A list control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 确保为列表控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for the list control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件指定和编写处理程序，以显示用户所做的选择。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the selection made by the user. value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果列表控件只允许选择一项，请使用此属性来获取选定项的单个属性。If the list control allows only a single selection, use this property to get the individual properties of the selected item. 如果列表控件允许多个选择，请使用此属性来获取从列表控件中选定的最小索引项的属性。If the list control allows multiple selections, use this property to get the properties of the lowest indexed item selected from the list control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 获取 中当前选定项的各个属性，并显示该项及其值。The following example demonstrates how to use to get the individual properties of the currently selected item in the and to display that item and its value. summary.span: 获取列表控件中选定项的值，或选择列表控件中包含指定值的项。

span.span: Gets the value of the selected item in the list control, or selects the item in the list control that contains the specified value.

value.span: 列表控件中选定项的值。

span.span: The value of the selected item in the list control.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回所选 的 属性。This property returns the property of the selected . 属性通常用于确定列表控件中选定项的值。The property is commonly used to determine the value of the selected item in the list control. 如果选择了多个项，则返回具有最小索引的选定项的值。If multiple items are selected, the value of the selected item with the lowest index is returned. 如果未选择任何项，则返回空字符串（""）。If no item is selected, an empty string ("") is returned. 属性还可用于在列表控件中选择项，方法是将其设置为项的值。The property can also be used to select an item in the list control by setting it with the value of the item. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). 如果所选的值不在可用值列表中，并且执行了回发，则会引发 异常。When the selected value is not in the list of available values and a postback is performed, an exception is thrown. 下面的示例演示如何在发生回发之前捕获无效值：The following example shows how to catch an invalid value before postback occurs: ```vb Me.DropDownList1.Items.Add(New ListItem( Text="Hello", Value="1" )) If DropDownList1.Items.FindByValue("2") IsNot Nothing Then Response.Write("Found") End If ``` ```csharp this.DropDownList1.Items.Add(new ListItem{ Text="Hello", Value="1" }); if(DropDownList1.Items.FindByValue("2") != null) { Response.Write("Found"); } ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性选择 控件中的项。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to select an item in a control. 请注意，此属性还可用于检索选定项的值。Notice that this property can also be used to retrieve the value of the selected item. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/CS/listcontrolselectedvaluecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/VB/listcontrolselectedvaluevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 选定值是不在可用值列表中，视图状态或其他状态已加载（已执行回发）。

span.span: The selected value is not in the list of available values and view state or other state has been loaded (a postback has been performed).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取并设置 属性所用的相同值。The property gets and sets the same value that the property does. 属性通常用于确定 控件中选定项的值。The property is commonly used to determine the value of the selected item in the control. 如果未选择任何项，则返回空字符串（""）。If no item is selected, an empty string ("") is returned. 你还可以使用 属性，通过将其设置为项的值来选择 控件中的项。You can also use the property to select an item in the control by setting it with the value of the item. 如果 控件中的任何项都不包含指定的值，则将引发 异常。If no items in the control contain the specified value, an exception is thrown. 控件开发人员可以重写 属性，以支持与 属性不相关的功能。Control developers can override the property to support features that are not related to the property. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 当 和 属性更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the and properties change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 和 属性发生更改时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the and properties change. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 方法时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub TrackViewState ()
protected: override void TrackViewState();
override this.TrackViewState : unit -> unit

summary.span: 标记开始跟踪并保存对从 派生的控件所做的视图状态更改的起始点。

span.span: Marks the starting point to begin tracking and saving view-state changes to a -derived control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法被重写，以标记开始跟踪并将更改保存为控件的视图状态的一部分的起始点。This method is overridden to mark the starting point to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the control's view state. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员在扩展 时使用。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控件组，当从 类派生的控件回发到服务器时，将引发对该控件组的验证。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control that is derived from the class causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控件组，在派生的 回发到服务器时，将引发对该控件组的验证。

span.span: The group of controls for which the derived causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性指定从 类派生的控件在回发到服务器时导致验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control that is derived from the class causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当 "" 属性的值设置为 "`true`时， 属性才有效果。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 如果为 属性指定值，则当 控件回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果没有为 属性指定值，并且 属性设置为 `true`，则当控件回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配到验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for the property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 确定列表控件是否支持多选模式。

span.span: Determines whether the list control supports multiselection mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支持多选，则 方法不执行任何操作。The method does nothing if multiselection is supported. 否则，会引发 异常。Otherwise, it throws an exception.

span.span: is set to .
